subject: Boxing
Frauds and Swindling
Cable Television
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: Plaintiffs charge that the May 2 fight between Manny Pacquiao and Floyd Mayweather Jr. was a fraud and are seeking the return of their pay-per-view money.
snippet: Plaintiffs charge that the May 2 fight between Manny Pacquiao and Floyd Mayweather Jr. was a fraud and are seeking the return of their pay-per-view money.
